name: Bird Boxing
description:
Welcome to Bird Boxing, the world's highest-stakes competition

Fly, zoom around and punch each other in the skies

Try our original movement system to control your bird between the ropes. Adjust your trajectory, open your wings to drift, change direction and dash, and punch other players with jabs, one-two combos, or charge powerful straight punches.

Cooperate and compete alone or with friends

Every game mode can be played from 1 to 4 players, both locally or online.

Get to know the varied Bird Boxing Championship contenders

Birds from all around the world have come to compete and become the Bird Boxing Champion. Each bird has its own different playstyles, find your favorite!

Try all the different ways to play

Try the everyday normal flying boxing matches, train by punching floating blowfishes, compete in different challenges, score goals in wingball, be the fastest in racing mode, and others!
